item.description:
One of our beloved trivia partners, Laura Duncan, is leaving Tufts to pursue a Fulbright, so to send her off in style, we'll be meeting up at Orleans for happy hour and trivia on Wednesday, June 23rd. We're
meeting up for drinks and apps after work, and for those of you interested, we're playing trivia at 8 PM. There are teams of 5, so we will have to split up into a couple of teams.
item.how_to_find_us: I will hopefully remember to bring Jumbo and so I will more than likely be the only person in attendance who is carrying a little foam elephant.
item.name: Happy Hour & Trivia Night at Orleans in Davis Square
